features: 【Widely Use】 Multiple colors jump drive are widely used in school, office, colleges, universities, governement, media Industries photography studio or daily usage; Ideal Christmas gift for girls, children, students, friends, workmates, company or clients.

【Fast Transmission】 10 pack 16GB USB flash drive 2.0 provides Minimum Read Speed to 12MB/s and 4MB/s of write speed, features higher performance than general 2.0 usb flash drive, super cost performance 2.0 thumb drives package deal.

【Durable and Portable】The metal USB key flash drive is waterproof, shockproof and dust-proof. Durable metal casing with sturdy ring is made from high quality components. Tiny size 16gb pen drive can be attached to keychain or backpack through a lanyard hole, convenient and prevent loss.

【Easy to Use】 Plug and play, no need to install any software. Support Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / Vista / XP / Unix / 2000 / ME / NT Linux and Mac OS, compatible with USB 2.0 and 1.1 ports; Compatible with PC, Laptop, TV, Car, Audio and etc.
【What You Get】10 pack 16GB USB 2.0 flash drive with 5 different colors, 12-month warranty and lifetime technology support, any problem about the product please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: · Plug and play, no need to install any software. · Quick and easy transfers of music, video and more. · Friendly Design, fashion, convenience, and easy to carry.

Please Note: The actual available capacity for data storage is less than what is listed on the products; As some of the listed capacity on a flash storage device is used for formatting and other functions; Actual capacity of 32 GB: approximately 28.5-30 GB.

JUANWE USB Flash Drive Basic Information: Chip - Grade A, original brand flash memory chip. Interface - USB 2.0 compatible (Backwards compatible to USB 1.1). Durability - 50,000 times read and write. Package - Packed in a secure cardboard organizer box. Capacity - 32 GB. Color - Black/Blue/Pink/Gold/Green. Compatibility - Desktop, Laptop, Macintosh, Tablet, Speakers all with USB port. Operating System - Windows 7/Vista/XP/2000/ME/NT/98, Linux and Mac OS.

Friendly Design Cap-less design, waterproof, shockproof, dust-proof , COB (Chip On Board) and key shape design brings the benefit of super slim size, light weight, easy carry. Wide Usage Fast Data transmission speed, suitable for storing digital data for school, business or daily usage. The digital data includes music, video, photos, movies, manuals, software,etc. Safe and Reliable The electronic part of the U disk is packaged in UDP form with COB technology, which greatly improves the reliability. The shockproof and anti-drop ability is higher than that of ordinary PCBA. Waterproof and Durable This USB stick completely resistant to water, so it can be used normally after drying the water invaded from outside accidentally and keep the data safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, AND quick!
reviews.reviewText: These little guys have a surprisingly good read/write speed and even though they’re small in capacity, they work really well! So I bought a larger capacity version to match them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these
reviews.reviewText: They may not be the fastest of USB Thumb drives, but I really like them, and you can't beat them for the price! They look good and are unique, so when I give them out or share with my friends, they remember who gave it to them! I also like that I can stick one in an envelope with a letter, and it can be mailed easily with 1st class mail with the original stamp and envelope! I've purchased multiple sets, and only had one that didn't work -- the others have fared well, too. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend to people needing basic storage for a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun USB stick
reviews.reviewText: I like the bright colors and how durable these are. They fit on your key train nicely and they're always there when you need them. I do wish they were shorter in length. Overall satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only flash drive I now use.
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect in every way, never been rejected my any computer, easy to plug in and out, can fit many on a keychain, can be sent in a regular envelope, wide enough for a label maker, and the colors make finding the right one easy. I put one on my car FOB key ring, with all of my medical history on it, in case of an accident. Just great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice keychain USB drive
reviews.reviewText: I like that these are flat and they have a hole to put a keychain for use at any time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working as designed
reviews.reviewText: These jump drives are very colorful, who couldn't use a little color in their computer set up. And the fact that they're designed in the shape of a key (including a hole to connect to a key chain) is interesting. I'm still doing a burn in on them, but first blush this was a good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn't put any important data on these. However, they are great for keeping live-bootable OS images or installer images on them. Their color coding and size make them ideal for that. Plus, the key shape makes them pretty novel and fun to put on a key chain with any other USB drives you might have.Why not put any important data on these? Well, one of the five failed a quick size test using RMprepUSB with a usable size of 10GB. I did this test after trying these out and noticing their absolutely terrible read/write speed, even for USB 2.0. I ended up using Ubuntu to "Erase" the drives before getting any decent write speeds. The read speeds are and continue to be great though which is why I see these as perfect for live-bootables and installer USBs.At the end of the day, it was great value for my money despite the slight annoyance of having to use two Operating systems to erase and then format the drives. I essentially got four 32GB sticks for $20 which is a little better than SanDisk's 3 32GB sticks for the same price at Walmart. I wouldn't trust these out of the box with my main home computer, but after cleaning and testing, I trust them enough to hold some data. I still wouldn't put anything important on them as, with one failure already, it's both a lottery and a matter of time before another drive starts to fail and the bad one fails catastrophically.
